member.name: T:SecretNest.RemoteHub.IRemoteHubOverStream
member.summary: Represents the methods, properties and event of RemoteHub, based on streams.

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteHub.IRemoteHubOverStream.ChangeStream(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Changes the streams of the adapter used in this instance.
member.remarks: When calling this method, the state of the instance should be stopped. Or, an will be thrown.

member.name: T:SecretNest.RemoteHub.IRemoteHubStreamAdapter
member.summary: Represents the methods of RemoteHubAdapter, which converts RemoteHub commands and events to stream.

member.name: M:SecretNest.RemoteHub.IRemoteHubStreamAdapter.ChangeStream(System.IO.Stream,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Changes the streams of this adapter.
member.remarks: When calling this method, the state of this adapter should be stopped. Or, an will be thrown.
